results.adx_keywords: Deaths (Obituaries);Football;Siragusa, Tony (1967-2022);Baltimore Ravens;Indianapolis Colts;National Football League;Fox Sports
results.title: Tony Siragusa, a Defensive Lineman Known as Goose, Dies at 55
results.abstract: Siragusa won a Super Bowl with the Baltimore Ravens in the 2000 season and worked as a broadcaster after his playing career.

media.caption: Tony Siragusa celebrating during the fourth quarter of the Super Bowl for the 2000 season, which the Baltimore Ravens won against the Giants.

results.adx_keywords: Primaries and Caucuses;United States Politics and Government;Conservatism (US Politics);Income Inequality;Midterm Elections (2022);Boebert, Lauren;Trump, Donald J;Aspen (Colo);Colorado
results.title: In Boebert’s District, as Elsewhere, Democrats Surge Into G.O.P. Primary
results.abstract: Thousands of Democrats in Western Colorado are voting in the primary on Tuesday against Representative Lauren Boebert, part of a broader effort to defeat far-right Republicans.

media.caption: “The center has got to re-emerge,” said Tom Morrison, center, a lifelong Democrat in rural Pitkin County who voted for the Republican candidate Don Coram, not only in protest of Representative Lauren Boebert but also of what he called a rising concern about his party’s leftward drift.
media.copyright: Daniel Brenner for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Attorneys General;Impeachment;State Legislatures;Politics and Government;Traffic Accidents and Safety;Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Ravnsborg, Jason;South Dakota
results.title: South Dakota Removes Its Attorney General After Fatal Crash
results.abstract: Jason Ravnsborg, who killed a man with his car in 2020, was removed from office after the State Senate voted to convict him. He was impeached by the House in April.

media.caption: Attorney General Jason Ravnsborg of South Dakota listened to opening remarks at his impeachment trial on Tuesday.
media.copyright: Erin Woodiel/The Argus Leader, via Associated Press

results.title: How Biden’s Approval Rating Got So Low
results.abstract: Heading into the midterms, Democratic candidates are contending with the unpopularity of their party’s leader.

results.adx_keywords: Russian Invasion of Ukraine (2022);Ukraine
results.byline: By Valerie Hopkins and Marc Santora
results.title: The arrival of Western weapons begins to reshape the battle off Ukraine’s coast.
results.abstract: The Ukrainian military said it was attacking Russian infrastructure on Snake Island.

media.caption: Ukrainian weapons hit Snake Island, off the coast of Odesa, as well as a former natural gas rig where Russian forces had placed radio-jamming equipment, a former top defense official said.

results.title: Companies Brace for Impact of New Forced Labor Law
results.abstract: Billions of dollars could be at stake as a law banning imports of some products from China goes into effect.

media.caption: Container ships waiting to enter the Port of Los Angeles last year. Enforcement of a new law could lead the U.S. authorities to detain or turn away a multitude of imported products.

results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;internal-sub-only-nl;Governors (US);Presidential Election of 2024;Newsom, Gavin;Democratic Party;California
results.title: Gavin Newsom Pokes the G.O.P. Bear
results.abstract: The California governor is up to something as he bashes Donald Trump, Ron DeSantis and even his fellow Democrats. Just what, exactly, is a hot topic of discussion on the left.

media.caption: Gov. Gavin Newsom of California recently joined Donald Trump’s social media network, and for months he has taken jabs at ambitious Republican governors in other states.

results.title: Katie Britt leveraged her Alabama connections and political savvy to trounce Mo Brooks.
results.abstract: Ms. Britt, now the state’s Republican nominee for Senate, made her way to the top with an “Alabama First” message and skillful navigation of a rival’s fleeting Trump endorsement.

results.title: Analysis: What Turkey Wants to Let Finland and Sweden Into NATO
results.abstract: Finnish and Swedish hopes of being accepted as applicants by next week’s NATO summit meeting have been dashed by a Turkish government that says it is in no hurry.

media.caption: Finnish soldiers during NATO military exercises this month on an island in the Baltic Sea.

results.title: $3.2 Million Settlement in Police Killing of Daunte Wright

results.title: How a Dollar General Employee Went Viral on TikTok
results.abstract: Mary Gundel loved managing a store in Tampa, Fla. But when she detailed its challenges on social media, the company — and fellow employees — took notice.
